nodes.text: Pir'pwn was a male Gungan warrior who resided on Rori during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Captain Pir'pwn was a member of the Rorgungans, a group of extremist Gungans who violently opposed Boss Rugor Nass's support of Naboo's human population during the Invasion of Naboo and rejected any alliance between humans and Gungans.

Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, he occupied a gazebo perched atop a mountain. While in the gazebo, he sat on a throne while safeguarding a mysterious glowing stone placed on an altar in front of him. He was protected by a group of fellow Rorgunan lieutenants. Circa 1 ABY, a spacer attacked the Gungans and eventually stole the rock.

Captain Pir'pwn was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Pir'pwn was added to the game with the "Chapter 7" update, released on November 1, 2007.
